title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-1.12 - Federal financial participation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-1.12 - Federal financial participation

State Regulations

The rates of payment made for inpatient hospital services rendered to title XIX recipients established in accordance with the methodology contained in this Subpart shall be contingent upon Federal financial participation (FFP) and approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-1.12

Amended, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 27, effective
7/9/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
